name: Boots Versus Plants
description:
Features
  • Explore locations with a variety of traps.
  • Fight with dangerous mutant plants.
  • Infinite Ammo.
  • Open doors and mechanisms.
  • Save plants from a dangerous virus and keep the balance of power.
  • Lots of funny elements and references to popular characters.

Boots Corporation sends a Colonel named "Daisy" to battle with dangerous plants to destroy them all!

Find out the cause of infection and mutations of domestic cacti that have become intelligent monsters.
